name: Cloudy Days
description:
Game System

“Cloudy Days” is an orthodox text adventure. The story is told by clicking on the screen.

Story

"We have learned that a huge asteroid will hit the earth in 10 days."


Five days ago, in the middle of the autumn holidays, such an absurd statement was suddenly announced.
What kind of idiot would frown at such a statement?
However, the words were delivered to me through a dirty cathode-ray tube in the voice of an inorganic announcer, not a group of people from some seedy new religion.

Thus, the world has certainly changed.
The social infrastructure completely collapsed.
Violent assaults and food fights by desperate people abounded.
The world seems to be in a terrible state.

However, ...... that is only in urban areas.
In a rural area like this, the world is no different.
For the past five days, there has been no looting or assault in the countryside where I went back home, just a slow, peaceful passage of time.


It was as if there was a gaping hole in time .......
In that time, I inadvertently reunited with her.
I had done it. ......
Oh, how could this happen?
It was an event I feared more than the end of the world.
